mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(notice_title, notice_content, created_at, updated_at, type) VALUES (#{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, NOW(), NOW(), #{type})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM notice WHERE notice_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR notice_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY FIELD(type, 1) DESC, created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET notice_title = #{noticeTitle}, notice_content = #{noticeContent}, updated_at = NOW(), type = #{type} WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId}
